name: Kawaii Robotto
description:
Made in Global Game Jam 2018 (48h) with the theme "Transmission"

Immerse yourself in a fantastic mechanical universe!

Challenge this action and platforms game and get the adorable robot chick to reach its destination controlling the world around him.

Controls:

Up/Down arrow keys: Change Size
Left/Right arrow keys: Change Speed
Space: Change Day/Night

Credits:

Diana Mármol (@dianammarmol): graphics

Pedro Daniel López (@PetterKun): music and sound effects

Jorge Pedraza (@Deebrol): code and scene composition

Place: Córdoba (Spain) @gamejamodb
